actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a tax credit of $250 to an individual for expenditures for health insurance premiums.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals an income tax credit equal to one half the amount paid for health insurance premiums up to a maximum credit of $250.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a tax credit of $250 to an individual for expenditures for health insurance premiums.
